long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Chrome Tools will change your New Tab Page to Chrome Tools extension with Web Search.

Chrome Tools has every shortcut you need in your browser. This practical and useful tool gives you instant access to not so obvious options of Chrome browser with live weather, time/date & custom backgrounds. 

The Installation of this extension will configure your New Tab Page to Chrome Tools with Web Search. Chrome Tools extension is all you need to start browsing with quick access to popular widgets and sites. Customize your background and brighten your day.

The complete list of shortcuts and their application are listed below.  

- Open Incognito window – Opens a new window in private mode
- Apps – List all installed apps on browser
- Bookmarks - List of bookmarked sites
- Downloads – List of recently downloaded files
- Delete Browsing Data
- History - View Browsing History
- Malware Scanner - Check For Browser Issues & Data Breaches
- Manage Notifications
- Password manager – Review all saved passwords at one place
- Themes – Customize your appearance (theme, font, etc.)
- Update browser – Update to the latest version of your browser
- Web store – Web Store for extensions and themes


Permissions we request:

New Tab:
This permission allows the extension to replace the page you see when opening a new tab

Privacy Policy: https://browsertools.co/privacy.html
EULA: https://browsertools.co/eula.html

Uninstall Instructions: 
https://browsertools.co/uninstall.html
